data.name: TerraTech - Official Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Original Soundtrack to TerraTech. Composed by Dave Dexter & Holley Gray. Mixed and Produced by Tennyson Whyte & Jamie Finch.

1. GSO Theme
2. GSO Combat One
3. GSO Combat Two
4. GeoCorp Theme
5. GeoCorp Combat One
6. GeoCorp Combat Two
7. Venture Theme
8. Venture Combat
9. Hawkeye Theme
10. Hawkeye Combat One
11. Hawkeye Combat Two
12. Hawkeye Theme (Original)
13. Hawkeye (Original Combat One)
14. Hawkeye (Original Combat Two)
15. Grassland
16. Deserts
17. Mountains
18. Flats
19. Pillars
20. Ice
21. BONUS Halloween Theme
22. BONUS Halloween Explore
23. BONUS Christmas Theme

Soundtrack comes in .wav and .mp3 formats.

data.short_description: Original Soundtrack to TerraTech. Composed by Dave Dexter & Holley Gray. Mixed and Produced by Tennyson Whyte & Jamie Finch.
data.supported_languages: English, German, Russian, French, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Italian, Swedish, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Czech, Danish, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo T7600 @ 2.33GHz or AMD Athlon 64 FX-60 Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 520M or Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Three-button mouse strongly recommended. Spec may be subject to revisions during Early Access.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 750 @ 2.67GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 945
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 260 or ATI Radeon HD 5670
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Three-button mouse strongly recommended. Spec may be subject to revisions during Early Access.
